name: PEM_S_BAT_PERF_STAT_ALL_CPU_GROUP_PLATFORM
summary: Verify all CPUs in system-wide which core base_frequency excursion occurred due to events in a group: any/thermal/pmax/prochot/hot_vr duration=10/ sleep 60, with command: perf stat -o "$LOG_PATH"/out.txt -a \     -e "{pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name1,frequency_threshold=$max_freq_mhz,duration=10/,   pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name2/,pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name3/,\   pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name4/,pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name5/}" sleep "$duration"
